examples: Are you implying (that) I am wrong?
I disliked the implied criticism in his voice.
No me gustó la crítica implícita en su voz.
His silence seemed to imply agreement.
Su silencio parecía implicar un acuerdo.
High-yield bonds, as the name implies, offer a high rate of interest.
Los bonos de alto rendimiento, como su nombre lo indica, ofrecen una alta tasa de interés.
